description: [AFP] - For a Wall Street star once dubbed the "Baby Buffett," Bill Ackman is having a pretty bad year. Huge bets on companies like Valeant and Herbalife have delivered steep losses to the flamboyant billionaire's Pershing Square hedge fund. With some $12 billion under management, Pershing lost around 20 percent in the first half this year, securities filings show.
